Posts.Content: initally when I was diagnosed back in April I also experienced similar problems..I felt I'm pulling the strings on my own...by calling and asking about my appointments...Once I had BC nurse allocated,I  had her mobile number and email to get in touch when ever I need it.She was always able to change my  appointments(if needed) especially follow ups,scans and blood tests and also arranging some of them in one day so I don't have to travel to the hospital several times per week.But again maybe I was lucky with my nurse.I would advice you to call again on Monday to find out the date..Keep calling to remind them.. How ever there is National Guaidance for starting the treatment once you are diagnosed with cancer..I think it was 60 days...and they have to follow this... Have a look on the internet... Hope this helps.  Good luck. X Ani
Posts.Title: treatment plan appointment cancelled

Posts.Content: Sorry forgot...If possible texting them is better than calling and  living the msg..By texting you have evidence that you send the text.Also they may be busy with other patients or meetings so they can call you once they are free... X Ani
Posts.Title: treatment plan appointment cancelled

Posts.Content: I have first in the morning fresh lemon juice with warm water. After green smoothe with vegetables and just apple .. And after I take vitamins for a day. Folowing the  advice I read on this side before from chloecat45..thanks cloecat45. I also just have fish or chicken but all organic... Please note water more than 2 liters per day but I woud recomend filtered.."one step aaaatthe time" love Ani
Posts.Title: Post BC Treatment Low Immune System.

Posts.Content: Hi, my chemo was in my good arm and I had terrible pain.Thia was back in October.I was massaging my arm with arnica gel several times per day and I used arnica warming gel in the night...Still doing stretches as sometimes pain comes back but felling much better to carry bags...,however I still have scar on one of my vain but movement is back and less pain.Hope yours will be better by time...Wish you all the best.. Ani
Posts.Title: Sore veins post chemo

Posts.Content: And do all the stretches while on radiotherapy and put all the creams you are given..I find the aquaform gel working the best.Where I'm all was provided by nurses. There is the end....of tunel... Ani
Posts.Title: Sore veins post chemo

Posts.Content: I also finished my treatment and I'm on  Herceptin for a year.I was going to look at  some ,recommended from previous posts.... MIA Eurotunnel(you don't have to be traveling through tunnel). Southdowns I can't believe I'm looking to book a holiday...I will have 2 this year.I missed last year  because  of the  treatment.Love to all getting ready for deserved holiday.. Ani
Posts.Title: Holiday insurance Nowicantravel.co.uk

Posts.Content: I don't want to push you to take them .I  just checked the patient information leaflet " Take the tablets 15 to 30 minutes before meal and,if needed,before you go to bed...this is for one I have at home..Motilium (domperidone).just in case if you needed...You will know how you feel before you go to sleep...Hope you dont need them.... Xxx Ani
Posts.Title: medication at home

Posts.Content: I followed same routine as SR23 adviced,but starting  Domperidone the same day .I didnt wait to become sick and it was ok .. I used to write down on the boxes while in the hospital so I dont forget.One down, good luck ani
Posts.Title: medication at home

Posts.Content: Hi,,, welcome to our chats.... We all have different opinions.... However I find this site very helpful during my treatment.. We all have different side effects from this terrible treatment and we choose individualy how to deal with it.... I also believe nutrititon is best vepon to fight all this but as I said we are different".Welcome to our wonderful chats... Lough,live,love Ani
Posts.Title: New - My experience so far. Will it help you? Stage 2 + lymph; HER2...

Posts.Content: Hi Mo, My nurse adviced me to take Domperidone on the same day as precaution. I followed her advice during  all chemo circles and was fine but again we are all different.Wish you all the best without  sickens..and vomiting ..Let us know how you are doing... xxx Ani.
Posts.Title: medication at home

Posts.Content: hi lovely people..Can't have a normal sleep. Went thought all." Chemo (kind ok) nodes (upfront sentinel lymph node biopsy,0/4...    Had wide local excision (clear margins) herceptin ongoing and letrozole for next 5 years.next radiology.. not sure about it.. can you give me any advice about your experience.... This is my first post and I won't be going through all this without reading all your posts and advices  "
Posts.Title: Still awake..& radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Hi my mum has been diagnosed with grade 3 invasive ductal carcinoma ER positive (QS7)HER 2, lymph note biopsy 0/4 lymph notes. She's has undergone chemo FEC 3 cycles of docetaxsel (taxotere) she is currently going through herceptin for 1 year.She had her op which effectively removed the cancer cells and feedback provided was that it was clear margins. Her next stage would be to undergo radiotherapy and she is not 100 percent sure if the positive impact of this treatmeant will help her can anyone advise thanks everyone with your help.
Posts.Title: Radiotherpy treatment

Posts.Content: Hi all any advice to get night sleep?... This is terrible... Oncologist is saying is normal... But this is going on and on ...l For the last 2 m. I'm missing all activities  I was enrolled and made my treatment double ....Going through the radiotherapy.... Thanks....Lough,Live,Love..."Ani
Posts.Title: Here me go again 4am.. Club....
